info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 24 at 6:14PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...SNOW SQUALL... HAZARDS...A snow squall accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 614 PM MDT, a snow squall was along a line extending from 10 miles north of Parachute to near Delta and moving east at 35 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Rifle, Delta, New Castle, Orchard City, Silt, Cedaredge, Olathe, Paonia, Parachute, Hotchkiss, Collbran, De Beque, Crawford, Mesa, Battlement Mesa, Cameo, Molina, Austin, Maher and Bowie. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 43 and 107. U.S. Highway 50 in Colorado between mile markers 52 and 82. Colorado 13 between mile markers 1 and 6. Colorado 65 between mile markers 1 and 61. Colorado 92 between mile markers 1 and 40. Colorado 133 between mile markers 1 and 17. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
